resources.string: A grade type is a type of assignment that is weighted differently than others.(i.e. Homework, quizzes, tests, ect.)

Professor has a weird system where it all comes out of one big point total? divide each grade type\'s points by the overall number of points to find it\'s weighted percentage. If this comes out to a decimal, the more decimal places you include in the grade calculation, the more accurate your results will be.
Please refer to your professor\'s syllabus or online grading to find the weighting for your grades.
